import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import {clearItemFromCart, addItem, removeItem} from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import {selectCartItemTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import ItemHeader from '../item-header/item-header.component' const CheckoutItem = ({ itemTotal, history, cartItem, clearItem, addItem, removeItem }) => { const {imageUrl, name, type, quantity, price, id} = cartItem; return (
{history.push(`/shop/details/${id}`)}}/>
${itemTotal}
Size 6
removeItem(cartItem)}>❮
Quantity {quantity}
addItem(cartItem)}>❯
clearItem(cartItem)}>Remove
)} const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ clearItem: item => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)), addItem: item => dispatch(addItem(item)), removeItem: item => dispatch(removeItem(item)) }) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ itemTotal: selectCartItemTotal }) export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem))
